1010000000001001 //load acc with data 1
0110000000000000 //increment acc
0010000000001011 //add acc with data 2
0000000000000000 //invert acc
0110000000000000 //increment acc
0110000000000000 //increment acc
1011000000001000 //load acc with indirect data
0100000000001010 //jump to line 10
0000000000001100 //indirectly used to load acc with data 3
1010101010101010
0101000000001101 //jump indirectly using address 13
0101010101010100
0011001100110011
0000000000010010 //indirectly jump to address 18
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
1001000000010011 //store acc indirectly using address 19
0000000000010100 //indirectly used to store acc at address 20
